item.title: Fhiny Rabbit Pee Pads, Disposable Bunny Pads Charcoal Leak-Proof Super Absorbent Potty Training Pad with Quick-Dry Surface for Dogs Puppies Cats Kittens or Small Pets
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) 【Remove Odor】: Guinea pig disposable cage liner contains activated carbon, which can effectively remove and neutralize the smell of urine. When the pet during toilet training, say goodbye to the unpleasant odor! Keep your home clean air.【Strong Absorption】: The water-absorbent layer in bunny cage liner can accelerate the liquid to ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $23.98 - $18.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:20:12 UTC – Details)



【Remove Odor】: Guinea pig disposable cage liner contains activated carbon, which can effectively remove and neutralize the smell of urine. When the pet during toilet training, say goodbye to the unpleasant odor! Keep your home clean air.
【Strong Absorption】: The water-absorbent layer in bunny cage liner can accelerate the liquid to pass through the surface, and the liquid will be in contact with it to form a gel, which instantly locks moisture and keeps the surface dry and comfortable. Let pets develop a habit of loving cleanliness.
【Anti-Leakage】: The PE film layer at the bottom of the training pads is widened around to prevent the pet’s urine from leaking out, prevent soiling the floor and your furniture. It can be used not only indoors but also outdoors (used when traveling or playing leisurely on the lawn).
【Training Pad Size】: 100 count bunny pee pads size is 13″ x 18″ (33 x 45cm), replace the pad at a time, bid farewell to tedious cleaning work. Suitable for rabbits, guinea pigs, chinchillas, puppies, dogs, cats and other small pets.

4
Price: $23.98 - $18.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:20:12 UTC – Details)

Warranty & Support

Amazon.com Return Policy:You may return any new computer purchased from Amazon.com that is “dead on arrival,” arrives in damaged condition, or is still in unopened boxes, for a full refund within 30 days of purchase. Amazon.com reserves the right to test “dead on arrival” returns and impose a customer fee equal to 15 percent of the product sales price if the customer misrepresents the condition of the product. Any returned computer that is damaged through customer misuse, is missing parts, or is in unsellable condition due to customer tampering will result in the customer being charged a higher restocking fee based on the condition of the product. Amazon.com will not accept returns of any desktop or notebook computer more than 30 days after you receive the shipment. New, used, and refurbished products purchased from Marketplace vendors are subject to the returns policy of the individual vendor.

(as of Nov 30,2022 04:38:33 UTC – Details)


Make the most of every day with the sleek style, performance, and all-day battery life you need in our lightest Surface Laptop, all at an exceptional value. Ultra-light and portable profile, the apps you use every day, premium materials, and a choice of must-have colors will make this your go-to laptop.

Surface Laptop Go display has rounded corners within a standard rectangle. When measured as a standard rectangular shape the screen is 12.45” diagonally (actual viewable area is less). Some accessories and software sold separately.
Sleek design and standout value. At just 2.44 pounds, it’s light, portable, and easy to keep by your side throughout the day.
Be productive, browse, and binge watch on the 12.4” PixelSense touchscreen display.
Convenient security with Windows Hello sign-in, plus Fingerprint Power Button with Windows Hello and One Touch sign-in on select models.
Run your favorite apps and keep up on social media with a 10th Gen Intel Core Processor.
Show your best side on video calls, meetings, and virtual get-togethers with the built-in 720p HD camera.
You’re going to need Word, Excel, and PowerPoint. Don’t forget to add Microsoft 365

Every day, everywhere

Sleek design and standout value

See and do more on a 12.4”* touchscreen, in signature premium materials and a choice of colors, all at an exceptional value.

* Surface Laptop Go display has rounded corners within a standard rectangle. When measured as a standard rectangular shape the screen is 12.45” diagonally (actual viewable area is less).

Familiar features and trusted security

Get started with convenient security and the Windows you know.* Enjoy amazing sound for music and shows. And, easily connect to other devices and accessories.

*Windows 10 Home in S mode works exclusively with apps and programs from the Microsoft Store within Windows and accessories that are compatible with Windows 10 Home in S mode. A one-way switch out of S mode is available. Learn more at Windows.com/SmodeFAQ.

Get it done with your favorite apps

Collaborate, connect, and do your best work with the must-have everyday laptop. Power through your favorite apps, backed by all-day battery life.*

*Up to 13 hours of battery life based on typical Surface device usage.

Light and portable with smooth scrolling and dongle-free Bluetooth connectivity. Available in a choice of rich colors* to complement your style.

USB-C Travel Hub

Designed for professionals who travel, this adapter gives you the extra ports and connections you need when you’re working on-the-go or on-the-couch.

Microsoft Bluetooth Ergonomic Mouse

Work in comfort all day with our premium wireless ergonomic mouse. Navigate precisely and access your most-used features with 2 programmable buttons. Available in four colors: Matte Black, Peach, Pastel Blue and Glacier.*

*Available colors may vary by market

* Some accessories and software sold separately.

Premium Office apps, extra cloud storage, advanced security and more, all in one convenient subscription*.

PERFECT DESIGN: Maximize your work area. The desktop whiteboard is designed to sit perfectly between a keyboard and monitor and is slope angled for comfortable reading and writing, or typing when you are using it as a keyboard stand.
SMOOTH WRITING & EASY TO WIPE: TSJ OFFICE mini desktop computer pad comes with a smooth and durable temple glass dry erase writing surface. This white board allows you to write and wipes clean with ease over and over. Our easel whiteboard always stays white and easy to read.
HIDDEN STORAGE & PAD/MOBILE TRAY: De-clutter your desk by storing markers, magnetic eraser and other desktop accessories in the opening drawer or place markers on the accessory tray for quick access. And one more long tray on the top of the dry erase white board for your pad or mobile.
BEST GIFT IDEA: Christmas gifts for men and women. item.title: Amazon Basics Dog and Puppy Pads, Leak-proof 5-Layer Pee Pads with Quick-dry Surface for Potty Training
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) An Amazon Brand. Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 28 x 34 x 0.04 inches; 3.21 Ounces Item model number ‏ : ‎ HDXL50 Date First Available ‏ : ‎ December 7, 2018 Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ Amazon Basics ASIN ‏ : ‎ B07CWHTQW8 Country of Origin ‏ : ‎ China ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $29.30 - $25.82
(as of Nov 29,2022 01:36:27 UTC – Details)


An Amazon Brand.
Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 28 x 34 x 0.04 inches; 3.21 Ounces
Item model number ‏ : ‎ HDXL50
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ December 7, 2018
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ Amazon Basics
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B07CWHTQW8
Country of Origin ‏ : ‎ China

Includes 50 X-Large heavy duty absorbency pee pads for puppies and dogs
5-layer construction with absorbent core that turns liquid into gel on contact
Quick dry surface with built-in attractant helps aid in potty training
Plastic border on all 4 sides to prevent overflow
Leakproof plastic lining to keep floors safe from damage
Product dimensions: 28 x 34 inches (LxW, overall)

Amazon Basics Leak-Proof Dog and Puppy Potty Training Pee Pads

Versatile Convenience

The pee pads are great for puppy potty training, as well as incontinent senior dogs, post-surgery use or travel. Multiple sizes available.

5-Layer Leak-Proof Design

The pads feature a quick-dry surface, a surge layer, a sponge-like core that turns liquid into gel, a locking layer, and a protective plastic lining.

Built-in Attractant

Made with a built-in attractant, dogs are drawn to the pad when nature calls, which supports faster and more successful potty training for puppies.

Disposable

Once used, the pad’s absorbent design and leak-proof liner make cleanup easy. Simply gather up and throw away the pad, and lay down a new one.

4.5
Price: $29.30 - $25.82
(as of Nov 29,2022 01:36:27 UTC – Details)
